sentences.cn: 学者们过着隐居般的生活。

sentences.en: He broke away from the cloistered world of Boston.
sentences.cn: 他离开了波士顿的隐居世界.

sentences.en: He cloistered himself away with his books.
He cloistered himself in his study.
He had led a cloistered existence and had little experience of ordinary life.
sentences.cn: 他过著与世隔绝的生活,所以只有绝少的日常生活经验.

sentences.en: He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.
sentences.cn: 他隐居于修道院中已三十余年.

sentences.en: Nash did not live a cloistered existence nor was he spared the shocks that flesh is heir to.
sentences.cn: 纳什并非过着与世隔绝的生活,他同样也不能逃脱人生难免的种种打击.

sentences.en: Others choose lives of asceticism within our cloistered residence halls.
sentences.cn: 有些人自愿选择住在我们修堂里做苦行主义者.

sentences.en: She cloistered herself in the office.
sentences.cn: 她呆在办公室里好像与世隔绝一样.

sentences.en: the cloistered world of the university
